subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Aaron Gray’s size and scoring touch inside proved too much for smaller Robert Morris to handle and No. 2 Pittsburgh held off an upset bid by its city rival Wednesday night.
snippet: Aaron Gray’s size and scoring touch inside proved too much for smaller Robert Morris to handle and No. 2 Pittsburgh held off an upset bid by its city rival Wednesday night.
